column3: Confirm I will attend a meeting in Drumcondra this morning to consider re-entering politics. Watch this space and tanks for the interest!
My new deal will give me greater input into shaping Fianna Fail policies going forward. Looking forward to digging in!
I have decided to go forward because I want to heal divisions in Fianna Fáil. A wonderful future, a lot more to do! #FiannaFail
Rest assured, nobody is welcome in Fianna Fail if they betray the public trust #FiannaFail #DrainTheSwamp
@garvangrant Fairness is important to FF, personal attacks not part of ethos. We have made position on water charges clear @RealJoeDuffy
I am a resilient person and in public life you learn to take knocks. Great things ahead. Healing begins
@newsworthy_ie That was great craic altogether. We almost killed ourselves we laughed so much! Good times!!
@garvangrant @RealJoeDuffy Position on former Taoisigh in Presidential role has been made clear many times. B 2the E 2the R 2the T etc...ha!
Crooked Irish Times report unfair. Not good. https://t.co/WmzeikIVDw #draintheswamp
@rtenews Fianna Fail has made clear support for water charge protesters. #DraintheSwamp #ALotMoreToDo
@newschambers @simoncoveney They were all doing too well and they weren’t prepared to get out and do the slog
@thejournal_ie We had a long and deep discussion regarding various policy issues going forward, onwards and upwards only! Tanks #fiannafail
@rte @rtenews #FiannaFail has made it's opinion on water charges clear again and again and again and again and again and again
@thejournal_ie #DrainTheSwamp Shocking corruption in the old US of A. Won't happy in Eire on my watch.
@firefeind @thejournal_ie I don't think it helps to start throwing white elephants at each other
@xlanplays We have yet to formulate specific policy matters going forward but I'm raring to go, tanks
@sarmactweets  it was the collapse of Lehman Brothers  that did the real damage. They had testicles everywhere.
@crewzer24 @fiannafailparty The cynics may point to the past but we live in the future
@paulallenpr I never condemn wrongdoing in any area
@PeterMcNamara_ There have been disputes between fractions
@OfficCrumlinSC Going forward we have made plans to join the Drimnagh annual hunt with the one we do be having in Drumcondra
@oshma @thejournal_ie Eire opens arms to immigrants from all nations on God's green earth funded by <redacted>
@TecnoPaddy @thejournal_ie We haven’t been able to do all that we can but we’re not gonna hang anyone on the guillotine
@KimMunday1 @thejournal_ie I don’t think it helps people to start throwing white elephants and red herrings at each other
@Revolution_IRL Some people will dye their hair yellow or put rings in their noses
@lenybhoy @chezmik @JohnHalligan @IrishTimes We have made our position on Irish Water known again and again and have repeated that position
@OfficCrumlinSC I don't know how people who engage in those sorts of personal attacks don't commit suicide
@RealJoeDuffy @garvangrant Take a flutter on Coveney, Joe. Good man
@Revolution_IRL I don't know how the wasters don't just kill themselves
@JohnMurphy51 With hindsight, we all have 50/50 vision
@rte @rtenews I can confirm we have had very important and useful discussions with outcomes and that
@Revolution_IRL I'm always honest. I admit it
@JohnMurphy51 With the boom times getting boomier it's the best course of action. People have short memories hopefully
@xlanplays Stop being a whinger
@crowleytweet @IrishTimesPol @irishexaminer @irish_news That's quite unacceptable Charles, tanks
@KimMunday1 @thejournal_ie In actual fact I can - it's just the boom times getting boomier

@newsworthy_ie Don't upset the apple tart says you

@RealJoeDuffy will be punting Leopardstown on St Stephen's Day. Cash in hand (<;>) https://t.co/aqDnu1jrJo
@RealJoeDuffy Today's tip - get a grip or kill yourself ya whinger

There are those who personally are out to get you all of the time, and some of them have been personally out to get me for 20 years
